nodes.label: The Phantom Menace (1999)
nodes.title: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
nodes.description: Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi discover Anakin Skywalker, a boy strong in the Force, on Tatooine. Meanwhile, Darth Sidious manipulates galactic politics through the Trade Federation's invasion of Naboo.

nodes.label: Attack of the Clones (2002)
nodes.title: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
nodes.description: Ten years later, the galaxy stands on the brink of civil war. Anakin and Padmé fall in love while Obi-Wan uncovers a secret clone army being created on Kamino.

nodes.label: Revenge of the Sith (2005)
nodes.title: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
nodes.description: The Clone Wars rage on. Anakin succumbs to the dark side and becomes Darth Vader. The Jedi Order falls, and the Galactic Empire rises.

nodes.label: A New Hope (1977)
nodes.title: Episode IV - A New Hope
nodes.description: Luke Skywalker joins the Rebel Alliance in a daring mission to destroy the Death Star, leading to a new hope for the galaxy.

nodes.label: The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
nodes.title: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
nodes.description: The Rebels suffer a massive defeat on Hoth. Luke trains with Yoda and learns a devastating truth about Darth Vader.

nodes.label: Return of the Jedi (1983)
nodes.title: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
nodes.description: Luke redeems Vader as the Rebels destroy the second Death Star, ending the Empire's reign.

nodes.label: The Force Awakens (2015)
nodes.title: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
nodes.description: A new hero, Rey, emerges as the Resistance battles the First Order in the absence of Luke Skywalker.
nodes.refers_to: Kylo Ren, Starkiller Base, Han Solo

nodes.label: The Last Jedi (2017)
nodes.title: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
nodes.description: Rey trains with a reluctant Luke Skywalker while the Resistance suffers heavy losses at the hands of the First Order.

nodes.label: The Rise of Skywalker (2019)
nodes.title: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
nodes.description: The Resistance mounts a final stand against the resurrected Emperor Palpatine. Rey embraces her destiny.

nodes.label: The Mandalorian (2019)
nodes.title: The Mandalorian
nodes.description: A lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy finds a mysterious Force-sensitive child.

nodes.label: Ahsoka (2023)
nodes.title: Ahsoka
nodes.description: Former Jedi Ahsoka Tano investigates the rise of an emerging threat after the fall of the Empire.
